aththa washayenma me thiyena thathwaya thula lingika nidahasak labunahoth thathwaya meyita wada darunu wenna puluwan samajaya yahamagata ganimata ma yojana karanne pahatha sandahan karunu piliwelin 1 kramawath lingika adhyapanayak pasal thulin labadima 2 lingikathwaya pilibanda samajaye athi mithya matha puhu matha durukirima3 wikruthi lingika aashawangen pelennan waidya prathikara sandaha yomukota punuruththapanaya kirima. 4 yam kisi rogiyeku ho wikruthi manasika ayeku wethoth owunge thathwaya punuruththapanaya nisiparidi wenawadayi soyabalimata kramayak sakasima (polisiye anga bandima ha samana deyak sathipatha maspatha sayanayata aniwaryayen paminiya yuthu kramayak)5 yuropa ratawala pamanak neweyi asal wasi indiyaweth danata pawathina red layit eeriya wani kramawedayan athikirima (meyin ma yojana karanen naha ganika wruthiya nithi gatha karanna kiyala).6 yam kisi widiyakin ganika wruthiya nithigatha kirima samaja awashyathawayak nam ee sandaha kramawath wadapiliwelak sakas kirima.(danata thiyenawata wadiya samaja roga ehema adukaraganan puluwan prawanathawaya wadiyi.

eya deparshwaya wisinma awabodha karagatha yuthu deyaki.

landanaya mulkaragena kriyathmaka wana mema wyapara ha aarthika paryeshana aayathanaya wisin lowa pradhana ratawal 30ka aarthikayan pilibadawa karanu labu paryeshana adhyanayakin pasu owun me thorathuru prakashayata pathkara atha.

karnal wegunar athulu kandayamata yanaya kumana dishawak bala gaman kaleda yanna pilibanda kisindu adahasak nowuni.
ee kale athulatha ape mithuru kala dawasin dawasa wadi una wagema api ekinekath dawasin dawasa bohoma samipa wuna.
ohu thamath innawada danne naha.
namuth meya depaththa kapen kaduwak wanne murapadaya nithara log wimata bhawitha nokirima nisa amathakawa yamayi.
chandrasekaran amathithumage hadisi abhawaya kanduratama aalolanaya kaleya.
danata patu "dehapalanayak" (deshapalanaya nowe) ho no-kiyawimak lesa lalitha samaya gana puwathpath ha antharjalaya aasha්rithawa sandahan wi atha.
ohu anathurudayaka abhiyogayanta muhuna dimata tharam shakthimath pannarayak sahithawa sitiye ya.

yugaye awashyathawaya jayashri, bimata nawichcha goyam karal nowe…..dannawada bimata namunama wenade?…..thamange depalanga witharayi penenne…..awata wena mokawath penenne na……ape lokkantath oona ehema aya thamayi,………apita oona ehema bima balagena inna udawiya neweyi…..srujuwa hisa osawa aatha bala thaman awata wenne monawada, kiyala wichara buddhiyen hithala balala heta dawasa wadath yahapath dawasak karannata thamanta haki pamana parishramayak darana udawiya………
kohomatath man eka kathandarayakin thawa kathandara kipayakata links dana nisa wade thawath lesiyi.
eda e් wipaksha manthi්rawaraya wathman aanduwe pa්rabalayeki.
ee eka paththak pamani.
“man **** nandagen nayata illa gaththa.“
me thiyenne lesatama...

eda mulu wanantharayatama sathutu dawasak.
ee aadaraya rakaganna api danaganna oona.
ee kathawata kalin me kathawa ahala imu.
samanalaya saha apal gediya me thayiroyid granthiyen nikuth karana “homona “ kiyana diyarayak thamayi ape ange “sakriya bawa“ nisi mattamaka pawathwa ganna wadagathma meheya karanne kiyanna puluwan .
kurumbayak dekak kaduwa nam umbaata adatath banum..
anthimata depaththe aya samadana wela idama beda gaththa.
suwiti , oya sanipen pen man joliyen ...ane apita moko me wikara ganu katha..mala samayan ...ape payippa nala oona welawak wada neda ane, buru ande, bata sewane..

ithin oonama drawyayak washpa bawata pathwenakota ehi parimawa wadi wenawa.

ewani parlimenthu kriyamargayak sambandhayen madihath wi wibhagayak pawathwimata shreshtadhikaranayata adhikarana balayak nomathi bawata nithipathiwaraya wenuwen peni siti niyojya solisitar janaralwaraya mehidi karunu dakwa athi athara, eya salakillata ganiminuyi adala pethsam 5 wibhagayata nogena prathikshepa kirimata shreshtadhikarana winisuru madulla niyoga kale.

hen paluwa ha kuppi lampu kaluwara honda ara wadeta withara ya.
kese ho apa nindata wati tika welawakin kamp eke siti 12 dena gini malayak gasa ee wata ida sindu kiyannata patan gaththeya.apata owunge saddaya nisa ninda giye natha.
ee anuwa janathawa pidawanta path nowana lesa jalaya muda harimata katayuthu kara athi bawa pradeshiya lekamwaraya sandahan kale.

ee nisa me sambandhayen loka parimana ki්rayawaliyak awashya wenawa ekkama mewani thathwayanta muhuna diya haki, oroththu diya haki nagara nirmanaya, wagema janawasa nirmanaya, weralarakshanaya sandaha ratawal muhuna diya yuthuwa thibenawa.

siyaluma deshapalakayin adu wadi washayen wagakiwa yuthuyi , warthamanaye athiwela thiyana samahara prashna walata mulika hethuwa je.aar ge wiwrutha aarthikaya kiyala tharka karanna puluwan wunath , wiwrutha aarthikayen ratakata langa karaganna puluwan wasi (api thawamath sampurna washayen langa karagena nathi ) ekka balana kota wiwrutha aarthikaya gena eema waradiyi kiyanna ba , oonima deyaka adu padu thiyanawa .

marana parikshana katayuthu nima kirimata edina kalaya pramanawath nowima nisa pasuda (6) udasana 9ta adala parikshana katayuthu aarambha kirimata hadisi maranaya parikshaka thiranaya kalath pasuda udasana hadagath bawa kiyana puthu nopamini bawa pawase.

oba keren nithina suwadak hamayi.
wyapruthiya nawatha aarambha karanna api aluthin giwisumakuth athsan kala.

‘changumi’ windina duka ayata debas kawaddi mata danenawasithara pawithranijathika rupawahiniyen wikashaya wana ‘sujatha diyaniya’ teliwruththanthaya metharamma janapi්raya wimata balapa athi hethu athara ek pradhana hethuwaki; eya sinhala basin handakawa thibima.

"chanda nama lekhanaye ape nam athula dathwa thibenawa.ape gewalwalata api layit wathura aragaththa.ee kisima dekata ape padinchiya gataluwak wune naha.eeth ape daruwek iskolekata daganna yanakota sthira padinchiya illanawa.apata penena durin thiyena iskoleta bas wanwalin dura indan lamayi enawa.eeth ape daruwek me iskoleta daganna apita baha."murugayiya nadi pawasanne wedanabara handakini.

namuth warthamanaye di pawa shen ge ka්riyakarakam sadharanikaranaya karana china baladharihu ohu sesu aaka්ramanikayan men kisima ratakin idam angalak ho balahathkarayen yatath karagena nathi bawa penwa deyi.
eeka mama danne na.
eeth prathipaththiyak widihata danata rajaye sewaye yedena ayawa salaka balanne rakiya wirahitha ayata pramrakhasthanayak dunnata passe."
muhuda ralu wena kaleta thaththa kale mudu yana eka nawaththala gowithan karana eka.
" " ithin umbaa kelinma ba kiwwanan iwarayine machan...."
meya owunge pawule arbudayakata hethu wiya.
namuth jathika rupawahiniye adhyaksha janaral mahacharya sunil shantha mahathage sruju madihathwimen ema wadasatahana rathri 9.00th 9.30th athara kalayata balahathkarayenma obbawa atha.
ema sthanaya awata jalaya da wisiri thibu athara polisiya saka pala karanne tharuniya widuli sara wadimen miyagos athi bawatayi.
grisiyata ayath masidoniyawe rajakamata path aleksandar kumaru yuropaye sita godabima haraha indiyawa dakwa adhirajyayak godanangu palamu yuropiya palakaya wiya.
bhagyawathun wahanseta mese wadala.
apita hamadama ekama wedikawaka raswenna yanna oone nane.
obata me punchi nirmanaya kiyawala hari, yam watahimak aawa nam me sakas wechcha deya thula “mama” yayi nithya kisiwak nomathi bawa, me sulu mohothedi oba suwishala deyak karagaththa!
layanal sathunta aadareya.
ee pathiwala jana jiwithaye thibena dushkarathawa dasin dakagena, me wage podi kadayakata goda wadila beli mal koppayak ehema bila enna...
(dan ithin mata banapiyaw...hak...hak) innenan harima lajjashili, mokuth danne nathi, mokuth bari ekek wage (na bolaw sharon neme, ape me boga).
libiyawen naya ganna giyama kare atha danawa.
mama ethana kiyala thiyana widiyata mama hariyi kiyala adahana mathaya wenuwen mama peni sitinna oona.
eeka watila naha.

thedina nila sancharayakata ostreliyanu sankramanika ha purawasi katayuthu pilibanda amathi brendan oo konar mahatha shri lankawata pamineyi.shri lankawa saha ostreliyawa athara pawathna dwiparshwika sahayogithawa thawa duratath shakthimathkara ganima saha nithi wirodhi sankramana walakwime aramunin eeye (2) shri lankawata pamini amathiwaraya heta (4) meratin nikma yamata niyamithayi.shri lankawata pamini ostreliyanu sankramanika ha purawasi katayuthu pilibanda amathiwaraya rajaye jyeshta amathiwarun saha wiwidha aayathana pradhanin pirisak hamu wi sakachcha kirimata niyamitha bawada nithi wirodhi sankramana palana katayuthu sambandhayen mehidi wishesha awadhanaya yomukarana bawada shri lankawe ostreliyanu mahakomasaris karyalaya pawasayi.ee samangama nithi wirodhi sankramanikayan walakwima sandaha derata athara kriyathmaka wadapiliwela sambandhayen wishesha awadhanaya yomu karana bawada ema karyalaya kiyayi.mathaka di bali kriyawaliye di sakachcha kala prashna sambandhayen shri lankawa samanga akhanda sahayogayen katayuthu karana bawata brendan oo konar mahatha prathignya di thibe.me athara shri lankawe ostreliyanu mahakomasaris karyalaya sandahan karanne nithi wirodhi lesa ostrelyawata athulu wu shri lankika sankramanikayan 42deneku pereda (1) krismas dupathen pituwahal kala bawayi.ee anuwa pasugiya wasare agosthu masa 13 da sita me dakwa kalaya thula nithi wirodhi shri lankika sankramanikayan 1,071deneku ostreliyawen pituwahal kara thibena bawada eyin pudgalayan 862 deneku swechchawenma pamina thibena bawada ema mahakomasaris karyalaya kiyasiti..
me rate uthura nagenahira palathwala jiwathwana janathawa apa samaga aagamika sahajiwanayen katayuthu kala nam athi wuna winashaya walakwa ganimata thibuna.
